title: Ranked Disabled?
body:
Ranked is Greyed out for me right now. I cant be invited to lobbies either.
Tried restarting client but it didnt fix it


EDIT: Appears to have Fixed

replies.body:
Seems to be working fine for me, might just be a temporary glitch? Try restarting your computer, and then if it still is greyed out, try repairing the client, or just waiting.

Edit: See if someone else can invite you to ranked games as well? Maybe it will fix itself after that
